Join Us for Exciting Events

We thrive on creating occasions that unite our community, featuring live music, themed dinners, and festive celebrations

Our Events

At Port of Call, we love hosting events that bring our community together. From live music performances to themed dinners and special holiday celebrations. Nestled within the historic Charleston City Market, Port of Call Food and Brew offers the perfect opportunity to connect with others and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of Charleston

Upcoming Events
Comments Box SVG icons Used for the like, share, comment, and reaction icons 
No upcoming events

We love large parties! Contact us to explore packages that meet your budget and fit your needs.
Event Space Options 
Spacious and lively, perfect for medium-sized events.
First Floor Dining Area: 
Offers a private and elevated dining experience.
Second Story Dining Area: 
Great for larger gatherings, with an open-air ambiance.
Large Outdoor Patio: 
Each space features its own bar, ensuring your guests are well-served throughout the event.

[Page Title: Port of Call Food + Brew]

Home Menu Events Calendar About Contact Order Online Gift Certificates Skip to content 
Drop anchor, Wet your whistle and Savor local flavors

Join us at Port of Call, where every visit is an opportunity to savor the stories of the South. Your table awaits.
RESERVE A TABLE Culinary Adventure in Historic Charleston 
Immerse yourself in Charleston's rich heritage at Port of Call Food and Brew. Savor the authentic flavors of the Lowcountry with our locally-sourced dishes. As a proud local establishment, we provide a memorable culinary journey where tradition seamlessly meets innovation.
Menus Curious about where to find a diverse range of drinks in downtown Charleston? 
We boast three distinct bars, each carefully curated to provide a unique atmosphere and an impressive selection of beverages. Whether you're a craft beer enthusiast eager to explore local brews, a cocktail connoisseur seeking the artistry of handcrafted drinks, our bars cater to every preference.
RESERVE A TABLE 
Are you planning a big event or hosting a large party?

Look no further! We are your neighborhood hub, proudly serving locally sourced dishes and drinks that showcase the best our community has to offer. Whether you’re planning a large party or hosting a major event, we’ve got you covered with our spacious accommodations. Simply complete the form, and a member of our team will be in touch!

[Page Title: Menu – Port of Call Food + Brew]

Home Menu Events Calendar About Contact Order Online Gift Certificates Skip to content RESERVATIONS ORDER ONLINE 
Our Delicious Menus

Our talented chefs create dishes that are as visually stunning as they are delicious. Whether you're joining us for a special occasion or a casual meal, we promise an unforgettable dining experience.

Diverse and Delicious Menus

Indulge in our carefully crafted menu, designed to cater to all palates. From succulent seafood and perfectly grilled meats, every dish is prepared with precision and passion. Pair your meal with a selection from our extensive wine list.

DISCOVER

Our Brunch
Order Online 
DISCOVER

Our Dinner
Order Online 
Planning an event?

Let Port of Call take care of the details with our exceptional catering services. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, our expert team will work with you to create a customized menu that delights your guests and makes your event unforgettable. Simply complete the form, and a member of our team will be in touch!
